alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 1:55AM CDT until March 25 at 7:55PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Blackwater River near Blue Lick affecting Saline and Cooper Counties. For the Blackwater River...including Valley City, Blue Lick...Minor flooding is forecast. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Blackwater River near Blue Lick. * WHEN...From early this morning to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Cropland and pastures along the river flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri 7am 7am 7am Blackwater River Blue Lick 24.0 24.0 Wed 1am 24.9 25.7 21.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
